resources.string:
This app automatically detects spam and telemarketer calls, answers them, and plays a fax tone. This signals to automated systems that your number is a fax machine, helping to remove you from call lists.

The app requires several permissions to function:
• Phone access to detect incoming calls
• Audio permissions to play the fax tone
• Overlay permission for call handling

Your privacy is protected - no call data is stored or transmitted.
This app needs phone and audio permissions to automatically answer spam calls and play fax tones. No personal data is collected or transmitted.
